name: Rotatable
description:
Idea

A game where you rotate the level accordingly to get to the crystal!

Levels

The game has 10 levels that vary in difficulty and frustration ness. Some are easy, some are just frustrating. All levels are completable.

Control's

Use the a d or left right buttons to rotate, space button to trigger objects and r to restart the level!

Warning

If you're cube ever gets stuck then hit r to restart!
